properties.description: Shows all of the columns in each table for Infor.

content.query:
SELECT tabl.name AS table_name,
cols.name AS column_name
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/TableList.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [Tabl]
INNER JOIN (
SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://modineerlake.dfs.core.windows.net/unified-data-cluster/Infor/TestData/ColumnList.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) AS [Columns]
) Cols
ON [Tabl].object_id = Cols.object_id
